reuters.title: S/P REVIEWS UA COMMUNICATIONS <UACI> FOR CUT
reuters.body: Standard and Poor's Corp said it is reviewing for downgrade United Artists Communications Inc's single-B rating on 490 mln dlrs of outstanding and shelf-registered subordinated debt. Placed under review with positive implications were United Cable Television Corp's B-minus rating on 250 mln dlrs of outstanding subordinated debt and preliminary B-plus senior and B-minus subordinated ratings on 200 mln dlrs of shelf-registered debt. S and P said the reviews reflect its perception of the implications of a proposed merger involving the two firms. Reuter 
